TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract INavigateUIData

Docs.summary: Provides an interface that classes implement to provide navigation user interface data and values to navigation controls.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface allows navigation controls, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controls, to automatically render data from a data source that represents hierarchical site navigation data. The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode> type that is returned from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control so that navigation controls can render data automatically without a page developer explicitly defining the data binding associations to the properties of <xref:System.Web.SiteMapNode>. For example, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SiteMapDataSource> control enables declarative data binding so that a page developer does not have to populate the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.DataBindings%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties explicitly for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> controls, respectively.
The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData> interface can also be implemented on objects that are returned by an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control in order to enable automatic rendering of navigation control without explicit data binding.

Docs.summary: Gets text that represents the description of a navigation node of a navigation control.
Docs.value: Text that is the description of a node of a navigation control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Description%2A> property is rendered as the ToolTip text of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> controls.

Docs.summary: Gets the text that represents the name of a navigation node of a navigation control.
Docs.value: Text that represents the name of a node of a navigation control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Name%2A> property is rendered as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem.Text%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control.

Docs.summary: Gets the URL to navigate to when the navigation node is clicked.
Docs.value: The URL to navigate to when the node is clicked; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.NavigateUrl%2A> property represents the URL to navigate to when a navigation node, such as <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control, is clicked.

Docs.summary: Gets a non-displayed value that is used to store any additional data about the navigation node.
Docs.value: A value that is not displayed and is used to store additional data about the navigation node; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.INavigateUIData.Value%2A> property represents any additional data that is used by a navigation node, such as a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> control, that is rendered as an HTML `value` attribute for the node.
